<a id="nestedatt--items--spec"></a>
### Nested Schema for `items.spec`

Optional:

- `auth_secret_ref` (String) AuthSecretRef is the name of a secret containing 'username' and 'password' keys to authenticate with Prism Central.
- `heartbeat_interval` (Number) HeartbeatInterval is the time interval in seconds between successive heartbeats.
- `plugin_namespace` (String) PluginNamespace is the namespace for the custom resources.
- `prism_central_certificate` (String) PrismCentralCertificate is the certificate for the server to verify.
- `prism_central_host` (String) PrismCentralHost is the URL to the Nutanix Prism Central.
- `prism_central_poll_interval` (Number) PrismCentralPollInterval determines how often the plugin polls prism central for state changes. Unit is seconds.
- `prism_central_tls_verify` (Boolean) PrismCentralTLSVerify defines whether the client verifies the server's certificate.
